title: Riot 10th Anniversary Skins

replies.body: I got Sandstorm Ekko.
WHAT'S THE SONG?!??!?!?!?!
That's a nice skin. Has cool particle effects
None :( i have every skin in the shop and legacy, didn't even get the 490 RP like riot said or a mystery ward skin like other times. Feelsbadman

Hey,

We do it in waves so first we do the wave that can get Riot Kayle. Then we do the wave that gets mystery skins cause they had Riot Kayle. THEN we do the RP value of a mystery gift in the region. So hold tight, it will come soooon. But if you don’t have it by 24/09, let Player Support know.
I don't even have Riot Kayle yet
Demon vi. Guess I better learn to jungle now :c
Guess you better...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Meowkai

A skin I liked but didn't buy since I owned 3 other Mao skins. So its a good pick up.
Nice, a good collection. I'm the same with Zed. Got all his skins, but not sure if I wanna spend more on Championship yet

cant wait for championship zed


(wetting myself)
haha, same. I just got RP for it like an hour ago

I got my Rito Kayle, I'm happy.

Something for free is always appreciated.
sweet {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Recon Teemo! It's great if I want to relax a little from the battleworn voice which is Omega Squad.

{{champion:17}}
I got Bloodstone Taric, probably his worst skin or Emerald Taric is, either way it is better than Tundra Hunter Warwick, Caitlyn and Shyvana, the last 3 free things from Riot I've gotten.
lol, Riot thought you needed a break from those skins maybe :p
That shitty Legacy Halloween skin for Vlad. I can almost guarantee you that I'll only use it in ARAM.
Well, at least it's rare. Not something like assassin yi or something

I got Cutpurse Twisted Fate. 

(I actually disenchanted the skin a couple weeks ago, I wonder what I would have got if I *en*chanted it.)
One can only wonder
Wait, I only got Riot Kayle?
If you already owned Riot Kayle, **Riot** handed out a mystery gift instead.
Ahh, thanks for the info.
